info.title: Anime News Network Encyclopedia
info.description: Get data from the Anime News Network Encyclopedia in XML format.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the report to display; list of available reports is at http://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/reports.php

parameters.name: nlist
parameters.description: limit number of results in the report

parameters.name: nskip
parameters.description: skip the the first N items in the report
